鳥獣: (ちょうじゅう) - birds and wild animals; wildlife
鳥獣保護区: (ちょうじゅうほごく) - wildlife sanctuary; protection area for birds and wild animals
鳥獣保護区域: (ちょうじゅうほごくいき) - wildlife protection area
鳥甲: (トリカブト) - aconite (esp. species Aconitum japonicum)/wolfsbane/monkshood; traditional bugaku hat
鳥皮: (ちょうひ) - (esp. とりかわ) chicken skin (e.g. in cooking); (esp. ちょうひ) bird skins
鳥盤類: (ちょうばんるい) - Ornithischia (order of herbacious dinosaurs with bird-like pelvic structures)
鳥綱: (ちょうこう) - Aves; class of vertebrates comprising the birds
鳥肌がたつ: (とりはだがたつ) - to get goosebumps
鳥肌が立つ: (とりはだがたつ) - to get goosebumps
鳥肌になる: (とりはだになる) - to have goosebumps
鳥葬: (ちょうそう) - sky burial (funeral ritual in which the body of the deceased is exposed to be eaten by birds)
鳥貝: (トリガイ) - Japanese egg cockle (Fulvia mutica)
鳥追: (とりおい) - driving off birds; procession held at the New Year to chase away the birds for the year, with children singing songs as the villagers walked from house to house; female street musician who wore a braided hat and carried a shamisen; street entertainer who appeared on New Year's eve and performed with a fan
鳥追い: (とりおい) - driving off birds; procession held at the New Year to chase away the birds for the year, with children singing songs as the villagers walked from house to house; female street musician who wore a braided hat and carried a shamisen; street entertainer who appeared on New Year's eve and performed with a fan
鳥追い歌: (とりおいうた) - song sung by children during the New Year's bird-driving procession (later adopted by door-to-door musicians)
鳥追棒: (とりおいぼう) - stick used to drive off birds (during the New Year's procession)
鳥追歌: (とりおいうた) - song sung by children during the New Year's bird-driving procession (later adopted by door-to-door musicians)
鳥鍋: (とりなべ) - chicken cooked in a shallow pan with vegetables
鳥頭: (とりがしら) - long sword with birds' heads carved on the pommel
鳥頭の太刀: (とりがしらのたち) - long sword with birds' heads carved on the pommel
鳥類インフルエンザ: (ちょうるいインフルエンザ) - bird flu
鳥食蜘蛛: (トリクイグモ) - tarantula (any spider of family Theraphosidae)
鳥飼病: (とりかいびょう) - bird fancier's lung; bird breeder's disease
鳧が付く: (けりがつく) - to be settled; to be brought to an end
鳧を付ける: (けりをつける) - to settle; to finish; to bring to an end
鳧鐘: (ふしょう) - temple bell; (in Japan) 7th note of the ancient chromatic scale (approx. G sharp)
鳩が豆鉄砲を食ったよう: (はとがまめでっぽうをくったよう) - like a pigeon who's been shot by a peashooter (i.e. wide-eyed in shock)
鳩を飛ばす: (はとをとばす) - to fly a pigeon
鳩信: (きゅうしん) - communication by carrier pigeon
鳩尾: (みぞおち) - pit of the stomach/solar plexus; (水落ち, 水落 only) place where water falls
鳩胸: (はとむね) - pigeon chest (Pectus carinatum, deformity of the chest, protruding ribs and sternum)/pigeon breast; woman with big breasts
鳩酸草: (カタバミ) - (酢漿草, 酸漿草, 鳩酸草, 酢母草 only)  creeping woodsorrel (Oxalis corniculata); family crest shaped like creeping woodsorrel
鳩首: (きゅうしゅ) - going into a huddle
鳩首凝議: (きゅうしゅぎょうぎ) - (yoji) put heads together and confer; convene and discuss; go into a huddle (over)
鳩首協議: (きゅうしゅきょうぎ) - (yoji) put heads together and confer; convene and discuss; go into a huddle (over)
鳩首密議: (きゅうしゅみつぎ) - (yoji) going into a huddle (over); holding secret (closed-door) conference (about); laying heads together in secret consultation
鳩首謀議: (きゅうしゅぼうぎ) - (yoji) go into a huddle (over); hold a secret conference (about); put heads together and conspire
鳩麦: (ハトムギ) - adlay (Coix lacryma-jobi var. ma-yuen); Job's tears; coixseed; tear grass; adlai
鳳: (ほう) - Male Mythical Bird , feng (fêmea chinesa do pássaro de fogo)
鳳了草: (イワオモダカ) - Pyrrosia tricuspis (species of felt fern)
鳳凰: (ほうおう) - (sometimes erroneously associated with the Egyptian phoenix)  Chinese firebird; Chinese phoenix
鳳凰丸: (ほうおうまる) - Hōō Maru (Western-style Japanese frigate, launched in 1853)
鳳凰文: (ほうおうもん) - Chinese phoenix pattern
鳳凰木: (ホウオウボク) - royal poinciana (Delonix regia); flamboyant
鳳凰樹: (ホウオウボク) - royal poinciana (Delonix regia); flamboyant
鳳凰竹: (ホウオウチク) - Bambusa multiplex var. elegans (variety of hedge bamboo)
鳳凰貝: (ホウオウガイ) - Vulsella vulsella (species of clam)
鳳楼: (ほうろう) - tower crowned by a representation of the Chinese firebird; beautiful tower
鳳笙: (ほうしょう) - sho (Japanese free reed musical instrument)
鳳管: (ほうかん) - sho (Japanese free reed musical instrument)
鳳蝶: (アゲハチョウ) - swallowtail butterfly (esp. the citrus swallowtail butterfly, Papilio xuthus)
鳳閣: (ほうかく) - splendid multistoried building; Ministry of Central Affairs (under the ritsuryo system)
鳳雛: (ほうすう) - gifted young person who shows much promise
鳴かず飛ばず: (なかずとばず) - living in obscurity; lying low; remaining unnoticed
鳴きしきる: (なきしきる) - to chirp or buzz constantly (usu. insects or birds)
鳴き交わす: (なきかわす) - to exchange wooing cries; to cry (howl) to each other
鳴き出す: (なきだす) - to start singing (of birds, etc.)
